update sus_customer
TRADE_FEATURE = #{tradeFeature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICANT_TYPE = #{applicantType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CUSTOMER_CERTI_CODE = #{customerCertiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_OTHER_CERTI_TYPE = #{customerOtherCertiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CUSTOMER_TEL_NUM = #{customerTelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_INFO = #{contactInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRMN = #{crmn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRIT = #{crit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CROT = #{crot,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRID = #{crid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHAREHOLDER_NAME = #{shareholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHAREHOLDER_CERTI_TYPE = #{shareholderCertiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHAREHOLDER_CERTI_CODE = #{shareholderCertiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHAREHOLDER_OTHER_CERTI_TYPE = #{shareholderOtherCertiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAOI = #{caoi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CUSTOMER_TYPE = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SUS_HISTORY = #{susHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKPLACE = #{workplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REVIEW_STATUS = #{reviewStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_SSDS = #{customerSsds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRIME_TYPE = #{crimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDGR = #{sdgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URGENCY_DEGREE = #{urgencyDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRIGGER_POINT = #{triggerPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHER_TRIGGER_POINT = #{otherTriggerPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_TIMES = #{reportTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUBMISSION_DIRECTION = #{submissionDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOUBT_ANALYSIS = #{doubtAnalysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIREST_REPORTED_NAME = #{firestReportedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MOD_IDENTIFYING = #{modIdentifying,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SECOND_END_TIME = #{secondEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINAL_NAME = #{finalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINAL_END_TIME = #{finalEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_TIME = #{reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
